attributes.action: Educate all medical staff to understand ME, Fibromyalgia and Neurofibromatosis as recognised disabilities.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Not all medical staff currently understand the debilitating effect Me, Neurofibromatosis and Fibromyalgia can have on an indivdual. I urge the government to recognise these illnessess as recognised debilitating disabilities and provide funding for the research into these conditions.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Educate all medical staff to understand ME, Fibromyalgia and Neurofibromatosis as recognised disabilities."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page18291


Prime Minister's Office
